<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Usage">5644a3a71bfe7d1064122144b24bcb05</macroponent><name>highlighted_value_3/color</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {any} params.imports
  */
function evaluateProperty({api}) {
	var val = api.data.projectstatus_gliderecord.output.data.GlideRecord_Query.tsp1_project_status._results[0].cost.value;
  if(val=='green'){
    return 'positive';
  }
  else if(val=='yellow'){
    return 'warning';
  }
  else if(val=='red'){
    return 'critical';
  }
  else{
    return '';
  }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>VelentL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-05 14:45:20</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>2a44a3a71bfe7d1064122144b24bcb66</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>highlighted_value_3/color</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CIO Dashboard" source="sn_ciodashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_2a44a3a71bfe7d1064122144b24bcb66</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-05 14:45:20</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
